features: ⚠️ Please be aware that connection to the app may not be possible when using wireless CarPlay or Android Auto.

📸 2.5K*1440P Car Dash Cam: The front dash camera is backed by advanced starvis sensor and 6 glass lens. Front 160° wide angle can captures crystal clear video at QHD 2560*1440P dash-cam, which clearly captures the license plates and road signs.

📸 Super Night Vision: Dash Cam' adopts an ultra-large F1.6 aperture and 6 layers lens increase 60% light intake, and is equipped with WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) technology, achieves super night vision by automatically balancing the exposure in extreme dark scenarios, to ensure clear and sharp footage.

📸 Smooth 2.4G WiFi-APP Control: Use the App to view and manage wireless dash cam recordings instantly on your iOS and Android smartphone. Fast to download and share videos with friends and family through social media. Perfect dash cam wifi, truck, SUV, easier to provide evidence when insurance claim.

📸 Safe & Mini Design: Car dashcam made of high quality ABS+PC, the working temperature is from -40℉ to 185℉. With heat resistance chipset and adhesive pad, the car dash camera works fine and stays attached to windshield even on hot sun. Mini and hidden dash cam won’t obstruct your view while driving.

📸 24 Hours Parking Monitor and Time-Lapse: The parking monitor automatically activates and records emergency videos upon detecting collisions, (Requires hardwire kit, ASIN: B0BCPPN3YR). Dash cam that records 24/7 keeps recording with low power consumption and low frame rate, protecting vehicle from theft or vandalism.

📸 Loop Recording & G-Sensor - When the storage limit is reached on the memory card, new recordings will automatically overwrite oldest recordings. Triggered by G-Sensor, it can automatically detect a sudden shake/collision and lock the footage to prevent the video from being overwrote even in loop recording.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product Review: VEEMENT Dash Cam Front 2.5KI recently purchased the VEEMENT Dash Cam Front 2.5K for both myself and my mother, and a friend of mine also decided to get one. Here's my comprehensive review:**Shipping and Installation:**The shipping was exceptionally fast, and the installation process was surprisingly straightforward. Both my mother and I were able to set up our dash cams without any hassle.**Design and Build:**This mini dash cam is compact and discreet, fitting perfectly in our cars without obstructing the view. The build quality feels sturdy, which adds to the overall reliability of the product.**Features:**- **2.5K Resolution:** The 1440P camera quality is impressive. It captures clear and detailed footage, which is crucial for identifying details in the event of an incident.- **APP and WiFi Connectivity:** The accompanying app is user-friendly, making it easy to view and download footage directly from the camera to my phone.- **WDR Night Vision:** The night vision capability is a standout feature. It provides excellent clarity in low-light conditions, ensuring round-the-clock protection.- **160° Wide Angle Lens:** The wide field of view ensures that a significant area around the vehicle is captured.- **G-Sensor:** This sensor works well in detecting impacts and automatically saves footage of incidents, which is essential for insurance purposes.**Performance:**The camera performs consistently well. It powers up quickly, and the automatic recording feature is seamless. The video quality, both during the day and at night, is sharp and detailed.**Overall Experience:**The VEEMENT Dash Cam has significantly enhanced my sense of security while driving. Knowing that any road incidents will be accurately captured gives me great confidence. It's an invaluable tool for any car owner, especially for those who spend a lot of time on the road. The combination of its advanced features, ease of use, and reliable performance makes it an excellent investment for driving safety.**Verdict:**Highly recommended for its superior quality and functionality. It's a top-notch product that delivers on its promises, making it a wise choice for anyone in the market for a dash cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Must have gotten the bad apple
reviews.reviewText: This was a Christmas gift for a family member (my husband) with whom we share the same vehicle.I carefully read ALL the reviews about this product before purchasing it, both good and bad (and in-between as well). I was optimistic this dashcam would be a good choice, especially for the lower price point and with features only found on much higher priced dashcams. I must've gotten one of the duds!Installation was a breeze with great instructions. This was NOT connected to the fuse box which would require additional purchase in order to bypass the power cord for 24/7 "parking" monitoring. We just installed with the power cord hanging under the rear view mirror until we were certain it was what we wanted, then we would have purchased the kit for permanent mounting with constant power via the fuse box but it failed before that step was ever an option. I'm glad we didn't install it as a permanent dashcam since it would have been an additional expense for nothing.Camera on this dashcam seems to record absolutely amazing quality pictures and videos (when it did work for a week) but since Installation there seems to be something that's gone completely wrong because it has gone from being a great dashcam to an annoying piece of useless equipment!The dashcam has never been in the vehicle with any accidents, it hasn't been dropped nor exposed to extreme temperatures either. It hasn't been touched since installation where it worked great for a week but now this ANNOYING voice keeps repeating "VIDEO LOCKED" ......"VIDEO LOCKED"......"VIDEO LOCKED".I removed the SD card which was purchased along with this dashcam as a suggested purchase addition that was recommended for this dashcam (Samsung SD card) so I tried removing the SD card that was purchased with this dashcam and put in one that was also new but had never been used. I unplugged the dashcam from the power cord and even uninstalled the app, then started over as if doing installation for the first time. Still the same annoying "video locked" voice every few seconds at random "cluster events", even with the vehicle sitting still! I assume it's somehow glitching as if it's been involved in an accident or "event" since apparently that's when a video will automatically lock on this unit, yet this has never been in any accident nor anything remotely silimiar to what it could possibly conceive as an "accident", such as stopping suddenly or abrupt and fast acceleration. There's been absolutely nothing that this unit could have interpreted as an "accident" or "event" that would prompt the unit to "video lock" so often and so randomly.Since it was bought the beginning of December 2023 for a Christmas gift for a family member (my husband) and it wasn't installed until February 2nd, 2024, the window for returning it has long since passed. Lesson learned!I've spent far too much time on trying to "fix" this issue with basic troubleshooting, all to no avail, so this will be tossed into the electronics recycle bin since it's useless as it is. I'm glad it wasn't over $50 but still it's a loss nonetheless!Perhaps I just got one in the bunch that has a manufacturing defect, which happens and it is totally understandable, but it is what it is.I can't in good conscience leave a 5 star review when this unit is malfunctioning.It may very well be an awesome dashcam, as so many people have reviewed as such, but for our family, getting a few days of incredible video footage when this did work well, to a week later having it fail, it just isn't worth a 5 star review, sorry. It would have been great to have the experience like so many others have reviewed with this dashcam, but ours just wasn't a good experience. It was great for a week, even night vision video was mind blowing for the price of this little dashcam but not just for a week of use.Into the electronics recycle bin it goes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the EEMENT Dash Cam Front 2.5K mini dash cam for myself to replace one I had for a few years. I couldn't be happier with my purchase. It's very easy to setup and use! I am impressed with the resolution and quality of the picture and the continuous recording gives me peace of mind that nothing gets missed. It is easy to connect to your phone and view the videos. I couldn't be happier with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It could've been 5 Starts. However...
reviews.reviewText: I have to be honest, the dash camera delivered! The video quality during both daylight and nighttime is decent. The camera comes with the static adhesive pad and the claw tool to help wedge the cable for an inconspicuous installation, it could've been 5 stars. However, the automatic greeting playback when starting the vehicle...boy, oh, boy... it IS extremely annoying and it cannot be disabled; which is sadly why I took out one star. In my case, well, I will be replacing it; but there is no rush. Otherwise, I would definitely recommend this simple, efficient, great video quality, and overall budget-friendly dash cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this camera! It works in every level of light and the picture is clear. I love the peace of mind I have knowing that there is a camera on board with me. I did not hard wire this camera into my car so the only annoying thing is that my car must be on to view the videos recorded. That being said, it was really easy to install, though there was some user error in getting the camera placed where I wanted it. The cord is long enough to go from behind the mirror, across the windshield, down the frame, under the floor mat and plug into the car charger. Sometimes I think about getting another one for the rear view, but I don't know if they would both work on the app.
Ordered 2 of these and will order one more. Could not get my Samsung to work with the cams but no big deal as I do have an I phone that works great.
Power adapter came damaged. Problem was corrected by Amazon rep. Set up was quite easy. Nice small size. Used an aftermarket USB to USB-C cable and it worked fine.
Daughter loved it so picked up another for her friend.
Issue with charger but company went the extra mile to correct the problem and it worked perfectly.

Camera doesn't even power on, I just different power sources but didn't turn on. Very light , seems like a toy. Complete waste of money. Requested a refund and it's been 3 days they still haven't picked up the package for return.!!
